system.classDetails:
Core Aarakocra Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Lifespan: Aarakocra generally live to their early 30s, and reach maturity at age 3.
  • Size: Medium; Aarakocra tend to have fit bodies with large wings attached to their back. They tend to stand around 5 feet tall with weights no more than 100lbs.
  • Speed: Your base ground speed is 25 feet.
  • Flight: Aarakocra have large avian wings on their back. You have a flying speed of 25 feet.
    To use this speed, you cannot be wearing medium or heavy armor, and you must have 5ft of space on each side of you in order to take off.
  • Taloned Feet: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.8U03HPHF94CYJIB9]{Taloned Feet}
  • High Altitude Adaption: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.79LYQZRBS8RP54OC]{High Altitude Adaption}
  • Languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Ave.
